archimate:Requirement.name: IR.1.1.2a: a) types of target environment that need to be assessed for information risks (e.g. critical business environments, processes and applications; industrial control systems and supporting systems/networks)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
